name: vc-flow
description: PoC showcasing how to use Verifiable Credentials to properly count votes and to authorize sending messages in a way that enables mitigating spams and DDoS attacks while also providing data verifiability (all users actions are signed with the corresponding proofs) and users privacy (no IP address or application-layer identifiers are correlated to user identity)
author: Nicolas Gimenez (Privency)
